title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 11, 2016  August Special Events 2016  Join us for special events in August 2016.   May 11, 2016  Summer Hours and Programs 2016  On Saturday, May 28, Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument will extend its hours to 8:00 AM  to 6:00 PM daily. These hours will last through the Labor Day weekend.  In addition, the Monument will also begin offering its daily ranger guided programs.  These daily, and sometimes weekly programs, will last throughout the summer.
